meanings.definition: A medium that was once believed to fill all space and to support the propagation of electromagnetic waves
meanings.sent1: In ancient times, people thought aethers were like invisible rivers carrying light.
meanings.sent2: The concept of aethers in science has evolved over the centuries.
meanings.sent3: When the scientist mentioned aethers, everyone looked up, expecting to see shimmering threads in the air.
meanings.sent4: The idea of aethers connecting everything in the universe is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: Imagine aethers as the threads that weave through the fabric of the cosmos.

meanings.definition: The clear sky; the upper regions of air beyond the clouds
meanings.sent1: The pilot gazed at the aethers above, marveling at the vast expanse of blue.
meanings.sent2: Birds soar gracefully through the aethers, enjoying the freedom of the open sky.
meanings.sent3: On a sunny day, the aethers seem to stretch endlessly, inviting daydreams.
meanings.sent4: The painter captured the beauty of the aethers in a breathtaking landscape.
meanings.sent5: As the sun sets, the aethers turn into a canvas of colors, painting the horizon.
